org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd

Class PhdBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd.PhdBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<Phd>

    public final class PhdBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<Phd>
    PhdBuilder is a Builder that will create a Phd object using the given values.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhdBuilder(Chromatogram chromatogram)
      Create a new PhdBuilder which has its id, sequence, qualities and positions initialized to the values from the given Chromatogram.
      PhdBuilder(Phd phd)
      Create a new PhdBuilder which has its values initialized to the values from the given Phd.
      PhdBuilder(String id, NucleotideSequence sequence, QualitySequence qualities)
      Create a new PhdBuilder using the given required values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhdBuilder

        public PhdBuilder(String id,
                  NucleotideSequence sequence,
                  QualitySequence qualities)
        Create a new PhdBuilder using the given required values.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Phd to build; can not be null.
        sequence - the NucleotideSequence of the Phd to build; can not be null.
        qualities - the QualitySequence of the Phd to build; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameters are null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the sequence.getLength() != qualities.getLength()

      • PhdBuilder

        public PhdBuilder(Chromatogram chromatogram)
        Create a new PhdBuilder which has its id, sequence, qualities and positions initialized to the values from the given Chromatogram.
        Parameters:
        chromatogram - the Chromatogram to initialize the builder values to; can not be null;
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if chromatogram is null.

      • PhdBuilder

        public PhdBuilder(Phd phd)
        Create a new PhdBuilder which has its values initialized to the values from the given Phd.
        Parameters:
        phd - the phd to initialize the builder values to; can not be null;
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if phd is null.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public PhdBuilder copy()
        Create a Deep copy of this PhdBuilder. Any modifications to either the original builder or its copy will not affect the values of the other.
        Returns:
        a new PhdBuilder instance; will never be null.

      • peaks

        public PhdBuilder peaks(PositionSequence peaks)
        Set the peaks of this PhdBuilder. If this method is not called, and this builder is not instructed to fake the peak data either by calling fakePeaks() or fakePeaks(int, int) then the built Phd.getPeakSequence() will return null. If this method is called AFTER a call to fakePeaks() or fakePeaks(int, int) then the given peaks value will be used instead of fake peaks.
        Parameters:
        peaks - the PositionSequence of the peak positions to use for this phd; may be null to signify that the phd should not have peaks.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given peaks value is not-null and does not have the same length as the sequence or qualities.

      • fakePeaks

        public PhdBuilder fakePeaks()
        Auto-generated fake peak data instead of the given peak data set by peaks(PositionSequence). The peaks will start and be equally spaced using the same format the Newbler uses to fake peak data for 454 traces in consed.
        Returns:
        this

      • fakePeaks

        public PhdBuilder fakePeaks(int firstPeakPosition,
                            int spacing)
        Auto-generated fake peak data instead of the given peak data set by peaks(PositionSequence). The peaks will start at firstPeakPosition and be evenly spaced by spacing positions.
        Parameters:
        firstPeakPosition - the position of the first peak; must be > 0.
        spacing - the spacing between peaks to use; must be > 0.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are ≤ 0

      • comments

        public PhdBuilder comments(Map<String,String> comments)

      • readTags

        public PhdBuilder readTags(List<PhdReadTag> readTags)

      • wholeReadItems

        public PhdBuilder wholeReadItems(List<PhdWholeReadItem> wholeReadItems)

        Create a new instance using the data collected by this builder thus far.

        Returns:
        a new instance of T.
